## Recipe Submission

### Checklist

Please ensure your submission meets all requirements:

- [ ] I have tested this recipe with the target application
- [ ] The recipe folder name matches the format: `{app}-{username}-statuskitchen-app`
- [ ] All required files are present:
  - [ ] `recipe.toml`
  - [ ] `assets/` directory
  - [ ] `dist/*.skr` file
- [ ] The `.skr` file is a valid archive (created via "Export for Cookbook")
- [ ] I have included a screenshot (recommended)
- [ ] The recipe does not duplicate an existing one
